cards.text: What's your most controversial opinion?
Do you think some cultures are better than others?
What's your take on the death penalty?
What's your take on the current education system and what would you change?
Do you think the system would work better with more centralization or decentralization?
Can you think of a system better than capitalism?
Do you think women have more struggles than men?
Do you think we are more shaped by culture or genetics?
What's your take on free will?
If you could live in any era, which would it be and why?
If you could implement one law, what would it be?
What do you think happens after death?
Do you like being human?
If you could erase one thing from existence, what would it be?
What is the most admirable aspect of human nature? What about the worst?
Do you think it's possible for men and women to only be friends?
What's a human characteristic that you believe will never change?
What do you think will be ridiculous in 10 years that is currently quite popular?
What's your purpose in the world?
Would the world be a better place without religion? Can we truly escape belief systems?
Is it true that happiness is the most important goal in life?
Is the value of everyone's life the same?
What do you think of the penitentiary system and what would you change?
Why are people so inclined to hold onto beliefs that cannot be proven?
How important do you think genes are in choosing friends and partners?
What's your take on addiction and how to deal with it?
Do you have taboos and do you think they are healthy?
How much do you think we are conditioned by our childhood and how it affects our relationships?
Is jealousy a normal thing in a relationship? Is it desirable?
In which direction do you think society is going? What are the scariest characteristics of our society?
What's your take on social media and how it affects our lives?
How much do you think the news is manipulated?
What's your take on monogamy?
Do you think slavery is inevitable?
